br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.items.Item
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.cards.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Effect, Fighter, Trap

    public class Card
extends Item
    Template for the behavior of the cards on the field. This class only concerns itself with the logic aspects of the card, not data.

      • readyToSummom

        public boolean readyToSummom(BattlePlatform platform)
        Verifies if a card is ready to summon based on its preRequisites
        Parameters:
        platform - Gathers the current data of the battle
        Returns:
        true: the card can be summoned right now false: the card can't be summoned right now
